description: I am excited to connect with designers and educators alike! I'm a recent graduate of NYU's ITP program, where I am completing a postdoc and teaching design with a critical lens @ Parsons School of Design. I am looking for my next FT role as UX writer/Content Designer. My website shares a bit of my journey. Curious? Let's connect!
